title: Secondary Air Injection Reed Valves - Inspection

body.body: Secondary Air Injection Reed Valves - Inspection
Check for cracks, bending or other damage to the valve flaps. Replace as necessary.
Check for damage to the seal areas. Replace as necessary.
Check the valve body to cylinder head seal for damage.
